price: 59. Kuwa fala dulmiga (shirkiga iyo xumaha kale) waxaa u sugnaaday saami (Cadaab ah)la mid ah saamigii asxaabtood, ee waxba yey dalbin in aan u soo dedejiyo (cadaabka).
arabic: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ذَنُوبٗا مِّثۡلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصۡحَٰبِهِمۡ فَلَا يَسۡتَعۡجِلُونِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-inna lilladhīna ẓalamū dhanūban mith'la dhanūbi aṣḥābihim falā yastaʿjilūni
translations: so let them not ask Me to hasten
so let them not ask Me to hasten
